web_snippets: Darcy Olsen is the founder and CEO of the Center for the Rights of Abused Children. Darcy Olsen. Education, Georgetown University · New York University ...
Darcy Olsen founded the Center for the Rights of Abused Children with a foster baby in her arms and a mission to help children grow up safe and loved.
Darcy Buerkle is Professor of History at Smith College, where she served as chair of the department from 2018–21.
